alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Gilchrist; Inland St. Johns; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:58PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist, Bradford, Alachua, central St. Johns, Putnam and Clay Counties through 145 PM EST... At 1258 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Raiford to 7 miles south of High Springs. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Hastings, East Palatka and Melrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Gilchrist; Inland St. Johns; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
